sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, VStack, HStack, Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionIcon, AccordionPanel } from "@chakra-ui/react" /***************************************************************/ import { Textarea } from "../style_components/textarea" import { Text } from "../style_components/text" import { SymbolButton } from "./symbol_button" import { symbols } from "../ressources/symbols" /***************************************************************/ export function SpellDescription(props) { function addSymbolCharacterToSpellDescription() { props.setSpellDescription(props.spellDescription + "$") } return ( Abilities :
